channel.title: VM on AmunRha's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VM on AmunRha's Blog

item.title: hell86 VM Crackme | by ttlhacker
item.description: Description x86_64 linux binary (tested on debian 9 and ubuntu 18.04, should run on any distro).

item.title: Discount VMProtect | X-MAS CTF 2019
item.description: Challenge Author: avlad171 This is a simple stack based VM challenge. We can solve this in two different ways.

item.title: Crackme | 3kctf 2021
item.description: Description Challenge Author: KERRO, Aziz Challenge Overview The challenge is a VM crackme challenge with 4 registers and a location to store data and opcodes.

item.title: 2k | redpwnctf21
item.description: Description Challenge Author: EvilMuffinHa Introduction This is a simple VM which has around 25-27 opcodes with instructions simple enough to be emulated.
